title: Next Bus Dublin
summary: The only app you'll ever need for finding out when your bus is arriving!
developerAddress:

description: Next Bus Dublin uses the Dublin Bus realtime information system to tell you exactly when your bus is arriving. No more guessing using fictional timetables! The app is packed with useful features, looks great and is easy to use.Features:- Easily add, remove and re-order favourite stops to get your times as fast as possible.- Filter results to see only the routes you want at busy stops.- Bus alerts so you know exactly when to leave to catch your bus.- Route map previews so you can check out the route before catching the bus- Each bus stop page has it's own StreetView so you'll know you're at the right one!- News updates from Dublin Bus- Ability to export your favourites so you don't lose them when moving to a new phone.- Get bus times on your watch with Android Wear support!Exclusive features in this paid version- Advertising removed- Add a shortcut on your home screen to any of your favourite stops for speedy lookup.- Add a home screen widget for your favourite stops to check times at a glance."A great replacement to the official Dublin Bus app" - Quinton O'Reilly, Tech Writer, TheJournal.ieArtwork courtesy of Stuart ScargillData provided by Dublin Bus and Biznet. This app is unofficial and not associated with Dublin Bus.
descriptionHTML:
Next Bus Dublin uses the Dublin Bus realtime information system to tell you exactly when your bus is arriving. No more guessing using fictional timetables! The app is packed with useful features, looks great and is easy to use.

Features:

- Easily add, remove and re-order favourite stops to get your times as fast as possible.
- Filter results to see only the routes you want at busy stops.
- Bus alerts so you know exactly when to leave to catch your bus.
- Route map previews so you can check out the route before catching the bus
- Each bus stop page has it's own StreetView so you'll know you're at the right one!
- News updates from Dublin Bus
- Ability to export your favourites so you don't lose them when moving to a new phone.
- Get bus times on your watch with Android Wear support!

Exclusive features in this paid version

- Advertising removed
- Add a shortcut on your home screen to any of your favourite stops for speedy lookup.
- Add a home screen widget for your favourite stops to check times at a glance.

"A great replacement to the official Dublin Bus app" - Quinton O'Reilly, Tech Writer, TheJournal.ie

Artwork courtesy of Stuart Scargill

Data provided by Dublin Bus and Biznet. This app is unofficial and not associated with Dublin Bus.
comments: This should be the official app.....not the other one. Great work anyway!!!

Overall I prefer this app to the official Dublin bus app. App feel and layout is much better & I like the fact you can time a bus so the app notifies you as the bus gets closer to your stop. One thing that lets it down is that unlike the official app it doesn't inform you off last minute route changes.   P.s. it would be great if in later updates the developer could bring Google Assistant integration.
Great app and works on my Huawei Watch 2. Very handy.
Thanks for update. Hopefully that will now sort out the recent crashing issue.
This app has become the app I cannot do without! It is wonderful!
Easy to use app along with companion app for trains  to manage my daily commute!
recentChanges: - Fixes for bus alert notifications on Android Oreo (8.0)
